claim_summary: CMS’s December 21, 2021 ARHOME 1115 waiver approval letter authorizes Arkansas to use premium assistance for Medicaid beneficiaries up to 133% of the federal poverty level to purchase qualified health plan coverage, limit retroactive eligibility to 30 days, and temporarily charge premiums up to 2% of income until December 31, 2022【118221702928095†L16-L39】.
